TopicTitle: [Tutorial] How to see your REP after hiding it.

Articles.Content:
It's quite simple.

Add this (http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/usercp.php?#reprecv) to your bookmarks or saved links or whatever, and whenever you want to see your received REP open it (and scroll down if you have infractions).

That way, you don't have to switch the "Hidden" option to see it then set it back.

Simple, no? Useful for "white bars" like me.
You can click "Settings" at the upper right of any page to take you to the same page (this is how I track my subscribed threads, too).
